name: Little Gatherers
description:
Game Description

Created by a student team at Abertay for Kythera AI, Little Gatherers is a game that showcases the uses of their AI software.

Play as the leader of a gathering party made up of small twig-like creatures known as Twigglys controlled by the Kythera AI. Order your Twigglys about to collect as much food as possible in a busy kitchen before the timer runs out. But be careful, humans are always wandering around, and if you get spotted, it’s game over.

Controls
  • Move-WASD
  •  Jump - Space
  •  Selection Wheel -   E
  • Magic Attack - Left click 
  •  Pause - ESC
Outsourced FX assets:

Luis Santos  
Kakky
Infinity Blade

Professional Projects @ Abertay University

Installation instructions
  • Download the Zip
  • Extract the Zip.
  • There should be an .exe called AllKythera_Shozwcase which will lauch the game.
